abstract: 本研究探討人工智慧於醫療診斷與決策支援系統的應用。This study investigates the application of artificial intelligence in medical diagnosis and decision support systems.
深度學習技術提升放射影像判讀的準確性。Deep learning techniques improve the accuracy of radiology image interpretation.
本研究建立護理資訊系統以提升臨床護理效率。This research develops a nursing information system to enhance clinical care efficiency.
基於人工智慧的方法強化癌症治療的個人化。AI-based methods strengthen personalized treatment approaches in oncology.
智慧醫療管理系統可協助醫院資源最佳化與病人照護品質提升。Smart healthcare management systems help optimize hospital resources and improve patient care quality.
